summary: man, Johnny Silverhand’s Chippin’ In is one helluva sick song and i’m dying of not being able to get it from somewhere or check...
body: man, Johnny Silverhand’s Chippin’ In is one helluva sick song and i’m dying of not being able to get it from somewhere or check out his other songs, ‘cause, you know… the game is like an eternity away from release date :/

summary: Ok guys, so I had a day off of work and so I made my own V in the Sims 4. I had to make some custom pieces (just the surface...
caption:
Ok guys, so I had a day off of work and so I made my own V in the Sims 4. I had to make some custom pieces (just the surface wires on his face and arms). All the other stuff is stuff that I had downloaded ages ago. 

Remember how The Sims 4 released ‘Create a Sim’ before the full game release? That was cool, if only CDPR would do the same lol

reblog.comment:
